name: Easy and Hearty Slow Cooker Beef Stew
description: A hearty warm meal waiting for you when you get home, full of tender beef, potatoes, and carrots in a rich flavorful sauce. Comfort food at its best! Serve with warm bread or rolls.
recipeIngredient: 1 ½ pounds beef stew meat, cut into cubes
1 (10.5 ounce) can cream of mushroom soup
1 (1 ounce) package dry onion soup mix

recipeInstructions.text: Combine beef, potatoes, carrots, and onion in a slow cooker crock.
Mix cream of mushroom soup, tomato sauce, onion soup mix, parsley, and pepper together in a bowl; pour over the beef mixture.
Cook on Low for 6 to 8 hours. Stir before serving.

aggregateRating.itemReviewed: Easy and Hearty Slow Cooker Beef Stew

review.reviewBody: I made this yesterday, it was the best beef stew ever!!!!  I added 32 oz of beef broth, and added a whole 15oz can of tomato sauce, because I didn't want to waste it.  I put in some celery also.  I used the beefy onion soup mix, because that is what I had.  I cooked it for 4 hrs. on high!  Everyone loved it!  Added alittle water with some corn starch for thickening, because of the extra liquid & it came out perfect!  Today, I added more potatoes & carrots and we finished it today!  Will make this recipe a go to one for Beef Stew!!!!

Made this today. Probably won't get 6 servings out of it. All in all, it was very good. About the only changes I made were, I browned the beef cubes before dumping them into the crock and I was afraid that it was going to be too dry so, I added a 480ml container of beef broth. In hindsight, I most likely didn't need to add the broth, as there seems to be a lot of liquid left over, but, I notice that another poster also added beef broth. Actually, I intend to freeze the leftover liquid and use as gravy? some other time. Will most definitely be making this again.
I Wish I could have liked this it was really easy!

I really like this recipe - it is a great base stew and not too soupy - which is very important in our house.  Based on other reviews and feedback from my family, I have modified it over time to the following:  I brown the meat and substitute celery for the onion (I keep the onion soup mix).  I use a 15 oz can of tomato sauce, add 2 tablespoons worchestershire sauce and 1 beef boullion dissolved in 1 cup boiling water.   Enjoy!
Subbed 8oz beef stock for the tomato sauce and then thickened with flour at the end turned out delicious
This stew was delicious! My husband was very impressed. This will be my regular beef stew recipe from now on.

I made this today for dinner. Easy and yummy! It only took me about 30 minutes prep time. I browned the stew meat (about 3 lbs) prior to adding it to the slow cooker. I also altered the recipe by adding mushrooms a rutabaga about a tablespoon of worchestershire and approx. 1/3 c. red wine 1/3 c. beef broth and about 1/2 c. of beef gravy. The original recipe broth to meat and vegetable ratio was good but since I added ingredients I wanted to increase the broth. I liked my additions. Very yummy. I will make this again soon. I'm sure the recipe would have been great as is. I think the cream of mushroom soup tomato sauce and onion soup mix are a winning combination. Thank you!!!

Made this tonight. It turned out great! Really easy to throw together took about 20 mins. Cooked on high for 4.5 hours on high. This is too easy not to make again! Added mushrooms and celery and cut back on the carrots too. Just our personal preference.
